review: The Amazon Fire TV Stick is an awesome investment. Great bang for your buck!
author: Connor Roche

review: Using it to view prime instant video on my TVNcely done!
author: john

review: The Fire TV Stick functions excellently.  However the lack of free movies and TV programs in great quantity makes me give it one star.  I'm not intorenting or buying what I want to watch on TV.  The library has plenty CD's.
author: Jack C

review: Seems easy enough but when you got to activate each app separately, which it requires you to do, it doesn't always work.
author: Connied

review: Love the fire stick.  We own a fire TV and decided to buy a stick for the 2nd TV. works great via Wifi, no lag on Netflix or any apps I use on it,.
author: Nyck1118

review: easy to install: great streaming even in a house where the wi fi isn't great.
author: Gretchen Gemeinhardt
